entity.name: summary
entity.query: SELECT CONCAT('coinsummary-',coinsummary.id) AS summaryIdentifier, coinsummary.id AS id, hoards.id AS hoardID, coinsummary.denomination AS denominationID, coinsummary.mint_id AS mintID, coinsummary.numdate1 AS fromDate, coinsummary.numdate2 AS toDate, coinsummary.quantity, coinsummary.broadperiod, coinsummary.created, coinsummary.updated, denominations.denomination AS denomination, mints.mint_name AS mint, CONCAT(region, ' ' , area, ' ' , tribe) AS geography, users.fullname AS creator, users2.fullname AS updater, coinsummary.institution AS institution, coinsummary.createdBy, coinsummary.updatedBy FROM coinsummary LEFT JOIN hoards ON coinsummary.hoardID = hoards.secuid LEFT JOIN denominations ON coinsummary.denomination = denominations.id LEFT JOIN mints ON coinsummary.mint_id = mints.id LEFT JOIN geographyironage ON coinsummary.geographyID = geographyironage.id LEFT JOIN users ON coinsummary.createdBy = users.id LEFT JOIN users AS users2 ON coinsummary.updatedBy = users2.id
